mmn.guide.welcome.title: Welcome to Tuello!
mmn.guide.welcome.subtitle: Your web development assistant
mmn.guide.welcome.intro: Discover the main features of Tuello.
mmn.guide.welcome.feature.recorder.desc: Intercept and modify HTTP requests from your application.
mmn.guide.welcome.feature.spy.desc: Record and replay user actions with visual comparison.
mmn.guide.welcome.feature.track.desc: Track and highlight HTML elements on the page.
mmn.guide.welcome.feature.search.desc: Quickly find elements in the DOM.
mmn.guide.welcome.feature.json.desc: Format and validate your JSON data easily.
mmn.guide.recorder.title: Mock & Record HTTP Guide
mmn.guide.recorder.step1.title: Control Zone
mmn.guide.recorder.step1.content: Use these buttons to save, import, or delete your HTTP recordings.
mmn.guide.recorder.step2.title: Profile Management
mmn.guide.recorder.step2.content: Select or create profiles to organize your HTTP mocks.
mmn.guide.recorder.step3.title: Mock Activation
mmn.guide.recorder.step3.content: Enable this toggle so Tuello intercepts requests and returns your mocks.
mmn.guide.recorder.step4.title: Recording Mode
mmn.guide.recorder.step4.content: Enable this mode to automatically capture HTTP responses.
mmn.guide.recorder.step5.title: JSON Editor
mmn.guide.recorder.step5.content: View and edit your HTTP recordings in this interactive editor.
mmn.guide.spy.title: Spy & Replay Guide
mmn.guide.spy.step1.title: Recording
mmn.guide.spy.step1.content: Click to start recording your user actions.
mmn.guide.spy.step2.title: Playback
mmn.guide.spy.step2.content: Replay recorded actions and compare screenshots.
mmn.guide.spy.step3.title: Actions List
mmn.guide.spy.step3.content: Reorganize, edit, or delete recorded actions.
mmn.guide.spy.step4.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
mmn.guide.spy.step4.content: Customize shortcuts for screenshots and comments.
mmn.guide.track.title: Track Resources Guide
mmn.guide.track.step1.title: Data to Track
mmn.guide.track.step1.content: Enter a value to search in HTTP requests.
mmn.guide.track.step2.title: Activation
mmn.guide.track.step2.content: Enable tracking to highlight matching elements.
mmn.guide.track.step3.title: Results
mmn.guide.track.step3.content: Found elements are displayed here with their context.
mmn.guide.search.title: Search Elements Guide
mmn.guide.search.step1.title: Element to Search
mmn.guide.search.step1.content: Enter an HTML tag, attribute, or text to search.
mmn.guide.search.step2.title: Add Element
mmn.guide.search.step2.content: Add multiple search criteria to refine your results.
mmn.guide.search.step3.title: Activation
mmn.guide.search.step3.content: Enable search to highlight elements on the page.
mmn.guide.json.title: JSON Formatter Guide
mmn.guide.json.step1.title: Input Area
mmn.guide.json.step1.content: Paste your JSON here to format it.
mmn.guide.json.step2.title: Format
mmn.guide.json.step2.content: Click to beautify and validate your JSON.
mmn.guide.json.step3.title: Copy
mmn.guide.json.step3.content: Copy the formatted JSON to clipboard.
mmn.settings.guide.title: Interactive Guide
mmn.settings.guide.reset.success: Guide will be shown on next startup
